Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed

title.en-US: The right bean for pour-over coffee makers

description.en-US: What type of coffee bean and grind should you use when making pour-over coffee? Does it make a difference?

content.value: What type of coffee bean and grind should you use when making pour-over coffee? Does it make a difference? The short answer: yes, yes it does. Read more about what kinds of beans to select and how to grind them.
For pour over coffee, the best grind to use is a medium-coarse grind.

A medium-coarse grind will be similar in size to a French press grind but less chunky and will feel slightly smoother. If you are using a cone-shaped pour over, then use a medium-fine coffee grind instead.
Since there are many different pour over brewers, each one will need a slightly different grind. You may need to experiment a bit more with this method until you find what tastes best for you.
Keep in mind: the less time the water is in contact with the coffee grind, the finer the grind should be.

title.en-US: How to get the perfect grind for your beans

title.en-US: Find the perfect cup without leaving your home.
Finally - the perfect barista coffee without leaving home.

text.en-US: Welcome to JavaDrip. We are a boutique coffee company obsessed with the perfect cup of coffee. We believe that the perfect cup starts with the perfect bean and that those beans require the perfect brewing method. This means that we offer both high quality beans and products to meet any occasion and mood. Have a look around and let us know if you have any questions.

Combining the greatest traditions with cutting edge technology, the Smart Home Barista puts decades of coffee experience at your fingertips. By learning your tastes and assessing the beans, the smart barista adjusts the grind, pressure and length of each espresso shot to make sure it’s perfect every time.

description.en-US: If you can't find the answer to your question please reach out to support@javadrip.coffee.

title.en-US: Four user profiles for full taste customization

description.en-US: You may love your family more than anything, but that doesn’t mean you love your coffee the same way. The Cervello di Caffè stores up to four taste profiles, which are applied automatically when you use your app or voice assistant to start the brewing process or can be set manually on the machine.

title.en-US: AI-optimized grinding and delivery ensures that every coffee is just how you like it

description.en-US: Not everyone has decades of experience selecting, roasting and grinding coffee - but that doesn’t mean they don’t deserve a perfect espresso every time. That’s why we’ve worked with the industry’s top experts to create an AI system that gives you the coffee you deserve.
